prod_name: BOAZ LEGGINGS GLOW IN THE DARK
detail_desc: Leggings in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in soft bouclé yarn with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in soft microfibre with a lace trim at the top and around the legs. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Brushed inside.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a dress and leggings. Patterned dress with long sleeves and gathered tiers to the hem. Unlined. Ribbed, ankle-length leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and ties at the hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with short, lace-trimmed sleeves. Lined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and short sleeves trimmed with a gathered frill.

Blouse in an airy, weave with a V-neck, buttons and pin-tucks down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, short, flounced sleeves and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Romper suit in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, press-studs at the shoulders and crotch, and short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sleeveless dress in patterned tulle with an opening and pearly button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and hem with tiers to create width in the skirt. Satin lining.
A-line dress in lace with a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck, and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an open chest pocket and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with square toes, block heels and fluted soles. Height of soles 1.7 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.

Glittery jumpsuit in an airy weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front, a narrow elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and straight, ankle-length legs. Lined.

Playsuit in mesh with sequin-embroidered details. Deep, wrapover V-neck with a scalloped trim at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long trumpet sleeves with scalloped trims, a seam with narrow elastication at the waist, and wide legs. Lined.

Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with gathered side seams and a concealed zip at the hems.
Straight-cut, long-sleeved top in jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and a print motif.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Studs in the form of letters from A-Z. Length 0.5 cm.
Knee-length jacket in a patterned viscose weave with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. No fasteners.
Top in a soft, fine knit with lace shoulder sections and short lace sleeves with scalloped trims.
Small waist bag in coated fabric with a zip at the front, narrow adjustable waist strap and a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 6x13x23 cm.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Baseball shirt in soft jersey with 3/4-length raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft, rib knit with buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Hoodie in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood. Kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves, wide cuffs with a covered button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Rhinestone-decorated metal hoop earrings in the shape of a snake’s head at the top.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Contrasting colour faux fur collar, zip, side pockets with a quilted flap and press-stud, and ribbing at the hem. Lined.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Dress in a crinkled weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.
Short jumper in a soft, fine knit with an open back with decorative crossover straps that tie at the hem. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Large, elasticated scrunchie.

Short, straight-cut coat in a recycled, Italian wool blend with a small stand-up collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt that defines the waist and discreet side pockets. Lined. The wool and polyester content of the coat is recycled.
Lightly padded jacket in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar, hood and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and two mesh inner pockets. Elasticated edges around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Leather ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front and an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Tube scarf knitted in soft cotton with ribbed trims and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Jumper in a fine-knit wool blend in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with buttons down the back, a seam at the waist and a double-layered tulle skirt. Lined.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Espadrilles with a moccasin seam and tab at the front and a jute trim around the soles. Twill linings, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted top in cotton jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Short dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Square neckline, narrow elastication over the shoulders and a seam under the bust. Long puff sleeves with smocking at the top and cuffs, and an open back with narrow elastication at the waist and wide, horizontal ties. Overlocked edges around the shoulders and cuffs. Lined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Thin metal chain necklaces, one with two strands and the other with a shell-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 36-44 cm and 45-52 cm.

Set in an airy cotton weave. Sleeveless, patterned blouse with buttons down the back and a seam and peplum at the hem. Puff shorts with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and around the legs.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top made of soft, stretch scuba fabric in a relaxed fit with contrasting colour panels on the sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a round neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fabric-covered, USB 2.0 charging cable suitable for iPhones 5/5c/5s and iPhone 6/6s. Length 1 m. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Blouse in a softly draping weave. V-neck opening with ties at the front, gathered shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Bikini briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and a ribbed scalloped edge around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in bodysuit. Flounce over the shoulders, short sleeves and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch.
Hats in soft cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif on the front, slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.
Treggings in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Relaxed Fit.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and smocked seam under the bust. Unlined.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, a zipped sleeve pocket, flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud and an inner pocket with a concealed press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester padding and quilted lining.
Leggings in lightweight cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with an extended lower section in woven fabric and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
